New Records: India won the T20 World Cup for the second time
Key Match Events: Heinrich Klaasen scored 52 runs off 27 balls
Jasprit Bumrah took 2 wickets for 2 runs in the 18th over
Suryakumar Yadav took a clutch catch to dismiss David Miller
Pre-Game Insights: Rohit Sharma's men celebrated on the outfield with tricolor flags
The joy and relief were palpable after India's seven-run victory
Post-Match Reflections: Rohit Sharma announced his retirement from T20 internationals
Virat Kohli also announced his retirement from T20 internationals
Aiden Markram said it was a gut-wrenching loss for South Africa
Miscellaneous Highlights: The final was akin to prizefighters trading blows
Ravi Shastri delivered his best Michael Buffer impression at the toss
